headline: AppLovin (APP) PT Lowered to $686 by UBS Following Strong Q4 2025 Performance, Axon 2.0 Results
summary: AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) is one of the best upside stocks to invest in right now. On February 10, UBS lowered its price target on AppLovin to $686 from $840 while keeping a Buy rating. This announcement was made as the firm noted that AppLovin’s Q4 2025 earnings results exceeded expectations due to strong performance from […]
